title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) related deaths by ethnic group, England and Wales
description: Comparison of deaths where the coronavirus (COVID-19) was mentioned on the death certificate by broad age group, sex and ethnic group, using linked census and mortality records on deaths registered up to 17 April 2020. Includes death counts, cause-specific mortality ratios and odds ratios to identify differential risks of COVID-19-related deaths.
datasetNotes: On landing page click on the link for the latest release this will open another page
